mapper.update: UPDATE controller SET controller_info_id = #{controllerInfoId}, , controller_type = #{controllerType}, , ip = #{ip}, , PORT = #{port}, , controller_status = #{controllerStatus}, , description = #{description}, WHERE gsm_key = #{gsmKey} AND id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, java_class_name AS javaClassName, ui_class_name AS uiClassName, description, ui_help AS uiHelp, can_multi_logic AS canMultiLogic, default_period_size AS defaultPeriodSize FROM control_logic;
